title: Penske Racing Logo
content:
Hello all first time here! Was hoping you could help me identify the font used in this logo. Thanks for looking.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image003_4656.jpg)
author: jjdoyle

comments.content:
I looked at this one when you first posted it and thought of [Compacta Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235407/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/compacta-lt/black/) that had been slanted, but the R and G are wrong. I figured someone else would come up with a better mmatch.

- Mike Yanega

Maybe if you manipulated [Placard](http://web.archive.org/web/20110228235407/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/placard-mt/condensed-bold/) (squoosh flatter and slant), you could get a bit closer (at least the G is right, but the R is still wrong).

- Mike Yanega
Thanks Mike, I will give it a try.
